report.title: EBMS: Locations contained in a region.
report.description: Returns the list of locations that falls within a parent region. Uses the country location attribute, rather than st_intersects.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON l.id = lav.location_id AND lav.deleted = false AND lav.location_attribute_id = #location_attribute_id# JOIN locations region ON region.id = lav.int_value AND region.deleted = false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND l.location_type_id IN (#location_type_ids#) #order_by#

param.name: location_attribute_id
param.description: The ID of the location_attribute that holds the region for a location

param.name: region_location_id
param.description: The ID of the parent location (region) to filter for

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
